articles.description: Graham Potter is set to be named as West Ham manager plus reaction to Tottenham's win over Liverpool in the EFL Cup semi-final first leg.
articles.title: Football latest: Spurs beat Liverpool in  EFL Cup semi-final first-leg, Graham Potter set for West Ham

articles.description: West Ham appoint former Brighton and Chelsea boss Graham Potter as their new manager.
articles.title: Graham Potter appointed new West Ham manager after Julen Lopetegui sacking

articles.description: Lucas Bergvall scored a late winner for Tottenham against Liverpool in the Carabao Cup semi-final first leg, but there was controversy over whether he should have been on the pitch.
articles.title: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou shares Liverpool frustrations on rules

articles.description: Britain's Jacob Fearnley is set to face Nick Kyrgios - and a partisan home crowd - in the controversial Australian's return to Grand Slam tennis.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Nick Kyrgios to face Jacob Fearnley in Melbourne opener, Emma Raducanu faces Ekaterina Alexandrova

articles.description: Tottenham's trio of young stars give Postecoglou the perfect tonic with Carabao Cup semi-final win against Liverpool.
articles.title: Tottenham 1-0 Liverpool: Lucas Bergvall headline act as young Spurs show remarkable maturity

articles.description: Pat Cummins will miss the tour of Sri Lanka for the birth of his second child, with Steve Smith leading the side in his absence.
articles.title: Steve Smith to lead Australia in three-match Test tour of Sri Lanka

articles.description: England suffer a blow to their women's Ashes preparation as the only warm-up match is abandoned because of rain.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: England's only warm-up match abandoned because of rain in Sydney

articles.description: Andy Murray says he could not turn down the "unique opportunity" to coach his long-time rival Novak Djokovic at the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Andy Murray could not turn down 'unique opportunity' to coach Novak Djokovic

articles.description: The US Anti-Doping Agency (Usada) says it "fully supports" the US government's decision to withhold a payment of $3.6m (£2.8m) to the World Anti-Doping Agency (Wada).
articles.title: US Anti-Doping Agency 'fully support's US government withholding World Anti-Doping Agency payment

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Standing on the Shoulder of Kitties star Billy Bob Thornton with his predictions for all 32 FA Cup third-round ties.
articles.title: Sutton's FA Cup third-round predictions v actor and Liverpool fan Billy Bob Thornton
